title: MPfree: Korea In The Space – Velvet Hands
body: This psychedelic lo-fi number comes courtesy of the elusive and bizarrely named **Korea In The Space**. With the summer weather seemingly well and truly behind us, let _Velvet Hands_ transport your consciousness to a tranquil, sandy beach, complete with somnolent palm trees and the imperceptible hum of the harmonious ocean. Reverb laden vocals, reminiscent of **Panda Bear** dominant the antecedent section of the track, whilst midway through the vocals fade out and the addictive guitar-drum combo takes the wheel. Stream and download _Velvet Hands_ below, and oh, if you happen across any more information on this enigmatic artist, then let us know! Velvet Hands by Korea in the Space
